title: #101 - The Malicious, Menacing Moron - The Incredulousness of Keon Clark
description:
This week, we climb a mountain of stupid, and find a rainbow of crazy when we look at a man that simply refuses to learn a lesson. Guns, weed, violence, a police standoff, more problems driving than you ever thought possible... and, of course, cocaine. He tries to convince the world that he's fine, on several occasions, but trouble, and more arrests were never far behind!!
Blow all of your opportunities, pretend to have a seizure in court, and never, ever pay any of your bills with Keon Clark!!
Check us out, every Tuesday. We will continue to bring you the biggest idiots in sports history!
Hosted by James Pietragallo & Jimmie Whisman
Donate at...
